document_data.name: Fleshwort
document_data.mainbody: '''Fleshwort''' was a plant that could be used to aid in the healing of injuries.
document_data.Description: The stalks of fleshwort were gray and resembled [[celery]].
document_data.Usage: Fleshwort stalks could be sewn into the internal injury of any  [[Wikipedia:mammal|mammal]] to provide the raw materials for the body to grow new tissue.
document_data.Location: Fleshwort could only be found in areas where corpses, particularly from battles, were recently buried near the surface or left to rot aboveground.
